page.title: 10Employment/Industry
page.content: East Hoathly has an industrial area. Health pills are made from imported materials from Japan, Norway, U.S.A. and exported worldwide. Another firm makes ear defenders and masks for home use and export. There is an Aerospace Factory. An agricultural engineer mends and makes farm machinery. Farming and forestry are important, especially in Chiddingly. The Stud has bought 500 acres of land. They have 54 mares and employ 13 people. A fencing firm buys wood from the Con- tinent, they work on local contracts. Traditional Sussex smocks are made by gifted local needle-women and sold from a small shop converted by the designer, Mrs.J.Akers-Douglas. Vill- agers work either in the area or go out to local towns and a few commute to London but others come in to work. The factories use modern technology.
